body: Hello, After generating glazing using the "Honeybee_Glazing based on ratio" component, I'm trying to pare down the number of glazing objects that are created. I found the remGlz component, but am not sure of the structure for the srfIndex and pattern parameters. is there any documentation for the tool? In this forum I found a similar problem and solution worked on by Orn Erlandsson:   [http://tinyurl.com/pkzlpyr](http://tinyurl.com/pkzlpyr) ...but in trying to re-create his solution I believe I'm missing some of the connections. I have determined that the glazing elements I want to remove are the 2nd and 3rd out of 3 on each exterior (wall) surface, and have a culling pattern for all the window objects as they are broken out by the HB Decompose component: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/-gJiCE87YYrOxA4EbNRbgh6eRlIZfpAMgpN1-KTI1JX7io49vFyX3BScej95TlHWGTo-7iS9-mbTd5kfcjeBrQ6paSb2h0cv/Clipboard01.png) Any suggestions much appreciated!
